entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Bancroft

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
